metadata.title: CVE-2025-23108 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Opening Javascript links in a new tab via long-press in the Firefox iOSclient could result in a malicious script spoofing the URL of the new tab.This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 134.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
